name: v4.7.0
body:
- #837 Fix passing options to all_organizations 
- #841 Add new methods from the most recent org memberships API enhancements
- #851 Fix application requests for non dotcom hosts
- #858 Don't mutate the options variable passed to API calls
- #871 Add support to prerelease Integrations API
- #874 Handle PR Review errors
- #860 Implement Review Preview API
- #869 Use Organization.path for organization membership method
- #880 Fix incorrect mimetype for integrations in PREVIEW_TYPES
- #881 Change several occurrences of `Hash#merge!`

### Library Changes

#829 Sawyer dependency loosened to support new release `'sawyer', '>= 0.5.3', '~> 0.8.0'` Thank you @andrew

### Updated Methods

#821 
- [#protect_branch](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/repositories.rb#L516) `required_status_check` parameter is no longer required, which makes the method call signature changed. `required_status_check` can be passed in the options hash.
- [#unprotect_branch](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/repositories.rb#L551) returns a boolean value now

### New Methods

#820 Projects APIs https://developer.github.com/v3/projects/
- [#projects](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L18) List projects for a repository
- [#create_project](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L37) Create a Project
- [#org_projects](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L52) List Organization Projects
- [#create_org_project](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L71) Create Organization Project
- [#project](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L85) Get a Repository Project
- [#update_project](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L101) Update a Project
- [#delete_project](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L115) Delete a Project
- [#project_columns](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L127) List a Project's Columns
- [#create_project_column](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L142) Create a Project Column
- [#project_column](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L155) Get a Project Column
- [#update_project_column](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L170) Update a Project Column
- [#delete_project_column](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L185) Delete a Project Column
- [#move_project_column](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L202) Move a Project Column
- [#column_cards](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L217) List Column Cards
- [#create_project_card](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L240) Create a Project Card
- [#project_card](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L254) Get a Project Card
- [#update_project_card](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L271) Update a Project Card
- [#move_project_card](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L292) Move a Project Card
- [#delete_project_card](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/projects.rb#L307) Delete a Project Card

#824 Traffic APIs https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/traffic/
- [#top_referrers](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/traffic.rb#L16) Get the top 10 referrers over the last 14 days.
- [#top_paths](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/traffic.rb#L28) Get the top 10 popular contents over the last 14 days.
- [#views](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/traffic.rb#L45) Get the total number of views and breakdown per day or week for the last 14 days. 
- [#clones](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/v4.6.0/lib/octokit/client/traffic.rb#L62) Get the total number of clones and breakdown per day or week for the last 14 days.

Bugfix Release

Introduced in v4.4.0 #pages method was incorrectly updated to require the new preview header.

### Regression notice

#815 #pages method was incorrectly updated to require the new preview header. Fix released in v4.4.1

### Library changes
- #777 This impacts all methods that pass a repository parameter. Change Repository.validate_owner_and_name! to use URI::ABS_URI instead the deprecated URI.regexp
- #752 Use octokit_warn instead of warn in Preview.warn_preview
- #761 Octokit::AccountSuspended for 403 responses @koglinjg

### New methods
- #748 Add support for Source Import APIs @LizzHale 
  https://developer.github.com/v3/migration/source_imports/
- #814 #799 New method Repositories.branch_protection to get a branch's protection status
  https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/branches/#get-branch-protection
- #770 Add Issues#lock and Issues#unlock @davidcelis
  https://developer.github.com/v3/issues/#lock-an-issue
  https://developer.github.com/v3/issues/#unlock-an-issue
- #816 Add Pages.pages_build to get specific page build by ID https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/pages/#list-a-specific-pages-build

### Updated Methods
- #733 Support getting Milestones by repository id @stmllr
- #739 Escape options values in authorize_url @shvaikalesh 
- #705 #704 Support API urls in Repository#from_url
- #780 Dup options in #create_repo method before mutating the hash @davidcpell
- #815 Change Pages.pages to use preview media type to gain additional data. Add Pages.request_page_build for https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/pages/#request-a-page-build
- #797 Change #upload_assets to read files in read only mode @trevorrowe
- #743 Add deprecation warning for when :permission parameter is passed to Organizations.create_team. Assign team repository permissions with Organizations.add_team_repository instead.
- #805 *_stats methods return nil on timeout when : retry_wait is used. Previously returned empty Sawyer::Resource. @etiennebarrie
- #819 #protect_branch Enable branch protection without enforcing required_status_checks. @mgreensmith

### Documentation Edits
- #750 Fix typo in README.md @blunderdome 
- #804 @kei-s #create_pull_request_comment_reply
- #817 Fix .decline_repository_invitation API doc url
- #742 Fix Default.middleware documentation comment @v-kolesnikov
- #754 Add Table of contents to README.md

### Octokit Development Changes
- #751 Add webmock pessimism < 2.0.0
- #723 Improved the setup for the Issues specs by creating temp repos to test against @tarebyte

- #667 Fix org creation to include login and admin. @nmaki
- #668 Allow org hooks to be used by org login or ID @tarebyte 
- #677 Fix Migration API bug @gjtorikian 
- #678 Fix Managment console bug @gjtorikian 
- #680 Add Hooks#ping_hook method @joeyw 
- #682 Add Gists#gist_commits method @joeyw 
- #683 Add Gists#gist_forks method @joeyw
- #692 Fetch stats with retry
- #722 Add Source Imports preview to Octokit @tarebyte 
- #725 Loosen sawyer dependency @nlopes

- #649 - Creating Authorization with fingerprint - @jessicayang15 
- #652 - Add `Client#license_contents` method - @benbalter 
- #653 - Delete user Enterprise Admin API - @gjtorikian 
- #655 - Fix labels docs - @byroot 
- #658 - Custom error class for unverified emails - @johnpaulashenfelter 
- #660 - Fix user teams path to be Enterprise-friendly - @nBerg 
- #661 - Fix preview warnings - @pvdb 
- #662 - Add warning for protected branches preview - @pvdb 
- #664 - Add `Client#protect_branch`, `Client#unprotect_branch` - @tarebyte

name: v4.1.1
body:
- #641 - Validate repository format, raise more meaningful `Octokit::InvalidRepository` as custom `ArgumentError` - @simon0191 
- #644 - Allow custom headers when checking scopes on token - @tarebyte

- #627 Migrator API support - @gjtorikian 
- #628 Admin APIs for GitHub Enterprise 2.3 - @gjtorikian

name: v4.0.1
body: #620 Allow repo under an org using org ID instead of name. @tarebyte

name: v4.0.0
body:
- #567 New hook payload parser @zqzas 
- #568 Fix tests on JRuby, Rubinius @bjfish 
- #572 Licenses API support @zqzas 
- #582 Support for Enterprise-only APIs @gjtorikian @joeyw 
- #588 Remove defaults for Client#edit_hook @byroot 
- #593 Stop passing convenience headers in query string @krainboltgreene 
- #596 Support auto-pagination for listing user orgs
- #618 Paginate all orgs

- #564 Raise `Octokit::RepositoryUnavailable` when a repository resource is blocked - @Palleas
- #566 Support for get latest release, get release by tag name - @zqzas

- #543 Properly paginate PR comments - @gylaz 
- #544 New `Octokit::AbuseDetected` error for some `403` responses - @bhuga 
- #553 Make sure `owner/repo` string is properly formatted - @joeyw 
- #555 Remove some hardcoding from tests - @sm11963 
- #558 Separate constants for `Octokit::VERSION` parts - @jacobbednarz 
- #562 Properly encode spaces in Labels API paths
Support for the Org Hooks API Preview #539
Fixes a bug when creating an Issue without labels #538 @djreimer

- Deployments API is now final #537
- Fix bug with negative `resets_in` values for rate limiting #536 @markphelps 
- `Client#update_issue` now acts like a `PATCH` #531 @djreimer 
- Bumps Sawyer to support `Sawyer::Resource#each` lostisland/sawyer#33
- Various docs typo fixes
Supports [auto pagination](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb#auto-pagination) in `Octokit::Client#pull_requests_comments` - #526 @gylaz
Compatibility updates for v0.8.0 of netrc gem - #522
- Removes preview warnings for Team Membership API methods - #518 // @afeld

- #505 Remove preview warning for Combined Status API // @theckman 
- #507 Implement [Org invitation API](https://developer.github.com/changes/2014-08-05-team-memberships-api/) // @blt04
Fixes a bug where not sending the appropriate `Content-Type` request header would result in a `500` error from the API.
Support for new Team Memberships API

name: v3.2.0
body:
- Methods that take a repository `:owner/:repo` argument now accept an `:id` - #485 @joeyw 
- Methods that take a User or Org name argument now accept an `:id` - #485 @joeyw 
- Documentation type fixes - #488 #490 @abonas
- Fix tests for console masking - #493 @frank-west-iii
- Test improvements - #492
- Deprecate SSH key, Deploy key update methods - #491

name: v3.1.2
body: No changes since v3.1.1. Bumping to fix a RubyGems issue.

name: v3.1.1
body:
- `Octokit::Client#user_keys` no longer requires authentication #474 
- RSS parser is only loaded as needed #484 
- Numerous documentation fixes

name: v3.1.0
body:
- Numerous documentation edits - @catsby @salbertson
- Updates for [newly paginated methods](https://developer.github.com/changes/2014-03-18-paginating-method-changes/) - @jdpace #469 
- New `.as_app` method to use OAuth app creds over Basic Auth for some methods #467 
- Support for [token management methods for OAuth apps](https://developer.github.com/v3/oauth_authorizations/#check-an-authorization) #467

name: v3.0.0
body:
- Tweaks to support changes in the [Deployments API Preview](http://developer.github.com/v3/repos/deployments/). #443 - @atmos
- Support for the [Combined Status API preview](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/statuses/#get-the-combined-status-for-a-specific-ref) #456 - @bhuga 
- Remove Ruby warnings #434 - @sferik 
- `OCTOKIT_SILENT=true` to hush preview API warnings #447 @joeyw  
- Various test fixture improvements @joeyw

name: v3.0.0 preview
body: - Support for the [Deployments API Preview](http://developer.github.com/v3/repos/deployments/).

- Myriad of docs fixes @StephenOTT @joeyw @barisbalic
- Test setup tweaks @joeyw @sigmavirus24
- More API coverage @joeyw @md5 #373
- Date fields for Commit listings are now `DateTime` objects- lostisland/sawyer#16

- #350 Use relative paths for search requests for Enterprise - @benburkert
- #353 Fix method redefinition warnings - @zenspider
- #360 Properly paginate `.users`, `.following`, `.followers` - @arthurn
- #351 #352 #354 #356 #357 Numerous docs updates
#349 - Fixes an issue with .netrc support when the .netrc file doesn't include a line for the client's `.api_endpoint`. - @catsby
Redacts OAuth client secret and access tokens in error messages - #342 @catsby

- #336 Adds new `.available_hooks` method to `Client` - @danmcclain
- #338 Fixes a bug where app creds were not passed to API root - @rmetzler
- #335 Fixes a bug where pull requests weren't paginated - @pedro
Remove `warn` for Releases and Search APIs
Adds `Octokit::Conflict` for `409` errors. - @bhuga
Adds support for [`GET /user/teams`](http://developer.github.com/v3/orgs/teams/#list-user-teams).

- Restores 1.8.7 compatibility #317 boxen/boxen#111
- Removes spec files from gemspec to fix installation on Windows #313

- Adds support for the new [Releases API](http://developer.github.com/v3/repos/releases/)
- Adds `.errors` array to `Octokit::Error`

Updates to support [GitHub 2FA](http://developer.github.com/changes/2013-09-03-two-factor-authentication/).
- New error type `Octokit::OneTimePasswordRequired` raised when response is `401` but `X-GitHub-OTP` present
- New [idempotent token creation](http://developer.github.com/v3/oauth/#get-or-create-an-authorization-for-a-specific-app).

This new major version is [hypermedia-enabled](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb#hypermedia-agent), version 3.0.0 will aim to be hypermedia-driven. See the [Upgrade Guide](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb#upgrading-guide) for more.

#### Highlights
- Totally refactored `Configuration` and defaults to support memoized `Client` objects, required to use middleware like [faraday-http-cache](https://github.com/plataformatec/faraday-http-cache) for [conditional requests](http://developer.github.com/v3/#conditional-requests).
- Bumped Faraday dependency to 0.9
- New `Client#last_response` for raw access to the last HTTP response, including pagination headers.
- Moves `search_*` methods to `legacy_search_*`
- Uses [VCR](https://github.com/vcr/vcr) for more robust test request/response fixtures.
- Uses [Sawyer](https://github.com/lostisland/sawyer) under the hood for hypermedia support. HTTP responses are now proper Resources with link Releations. `Client.root` and `Client#agent` are also provided to make hypermedia requests:

``` ruby
>> Octokit.root.rels[:user].get :uri => {:user => 'mojombo'}

```
- Support for the new [Search APIs](http://git.io/_-FA3g) as a preview feature.

```
>> Octokit.search_code 'octokit in:file extension:gemspec'
WARNING: The preview version of the Search API is not yet suitable for production use.
See the blog post for details: http://git.io/_-FA3g

#<Sawyer::Resource:0x007faf749ec138 @_agent=<Sawyer::Agent https://api.github.com/>, 
...
```
- Adds ability to check if one user follows another via `.follows?` - @catsby 
- Adds to new error classes for `403` responses:
  - `Octokit::TooManyRequests` when rate limit exceeded
  - `Octokit::TooManyLoginAttempts` when special login attempt limit exceeded

name: 2.0 Release Candidate 3
body:
- Adds ability to check if one user follows another via `.follows?` - @catsby 
- Adds to new error classes for `403` responses:
  - `Octokit::TooManyRequests` when rate limit exceeded

name: 2.0 Release Candidate 2
body:
This release candidate adds support for the new [Search APIs](http://git.io/_-FA3g) as a preview feature.

```
>> Octokit.search_code 'octokit in:file extension:gemspec'
WARNING: The preview version of the Search API is not yet suitable for production use.
See the blog post for details: http://git.io/_-FA3g

#<Sawyer::Resource:0x007faf749ec138 @_agent=<Sawyer::Agent https://api.github.com/>, 
...
```

name: 2.0.0 Preview
body:
This is the first pre release of 2.0.0 and includes a number of changes. While this version is hypermedia-enabled, version 3.0.0 will aim to be hypermedia-driven.
- Totally refactored `Configuration` and defaults to support memoized `Client` objects, required to use middleware like [faraday-http-cache](https://github.com/plataformatec/faraday-http-cache) for [conditional requests](http://developer.github.com/v3/#conditional-requests).
- Bumped Faraday dependency to 0.9
- New `Client#last_response` for raw access to the last HTTP response, including pagination headers.
- Moves `search_*` methods to `legacy_search_*`
- Uses [VCR](https://github.com/vcr/vcr) for more robust test request/response fixtures.
- Uses [Sawyer](https://github.com/lostisland/sawyer) under the hood for hypermedia support. HTTP responses are now proper Resources with link Releations. `Client.root` and `Client#agent` are also provided to make hypermedia requests:

``` ruby
>> Octokit.root.rels[:user].get :uri => {:user => 'mojombo'}

```

### Highlights
- [Stats API](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/ddae0e4eae5ae60eaac76fc52ea18a4555728043/lib/octokit/client/stats.rb)
- Read/write [Contents API](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/ddae0e4eae5ae60eaac76fc52ea18a4555728043/lib/octokit/client/contents.rb)
- `Octokit.all_repositories` [method](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/ddae0e4eae5ae60eaac76fc52ea18a4555728043/lib/octokit/client/repositories.rb#L88-L90) to fetch all repositories

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/compare/v1.24.0...v1.25.0)
